4314020.name: Aonaran Nevaeh
4314020.description:
AONARAN: NEVAEH is a first-person psychological horror puzzle experience built around exploration, observation, and environmental problem-solving. Investigate a quiet suburban block, interpret cryptic signals, and complete a session-based run where wrong decisions can trigger escalating manifestations that end the attempt.

The experience is driven by atmosphere, sound-led tension, and puzzles that reward careful attention. There is no traditional combat—survival depends on reading the environment, noticing patterns, and making the right decisions under pressure.

CORE GAMEPLAY LOOP
In each run you will:

  • Explore a environments and enter multiple locations

  • Search for key items and interactable objects

  • Read notes and environmental clues to determine your next objective

  • Solve interconnected environmental puzzles to progress

  • Respond to changes in the environment as pressure increases

  • Complete objectives before the attempt is ended

Failure is not about fighting enemies—failure comes from wrong decisions, missed signals, and hesitation at the wrong time.

FEATURES

  • First-person 3D exploration

  • Environmental puzzle solving and investigation

  • Horror built on atmosphere, escalation, and curated scare moments

  • Minimal guidance: players discover rules through exploration

  • Keyboard & mouse supported

SESSION LENGTH
Typical session length: 30–60 minutes depending on playstyle.

STATUS
AONARAN: NEVAEH is in active development. Release content and details may change as development continues.
